src:
Social media reacts to Lewis Hamilton's sixth World Championship
04 Nov 2019, 13:36 by Joseph Tyrrell

What a day. What a driver. What a champion. Lewis Hamilton secured his sixth Formula 1 World Championship at the US Grand Prix. How did social media react on a historic day?

cHAMpion



A tribute to Niki



 
From one champion to another



The world of sport pays tribute









Who is the GOAT?
